00050     private void cleanMail_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
00051     {
00052       DBDriver myDB=new DBDriver();
00053       myDB.Query="delete from messages where ID not in (select messageID from recipients);";
00054       myDB.nonQuery();
00055     }
00056 
00057     private void cleanPeople_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs e)
00058     {
00059       DBDriver myDB=new DBDriver();
00060       myDB.Query="create table temp(id int);";
00061       myDB.nonQuery();
00062       myDB.Query="insert into temp (id) select id from users;";
00063       myDB.nonQuery();
00064       myDB.Query="insert into temp (id) select id from newUsers;";
00065       myDB.nonQuery();
00066       myDB.Query="delete from person where id not in (select id from temp);";
00067       myDB.nonQuery();
00068       myDB.Query="drop table temp;";
00069       myDB.nonQuery();
00070     }
00071     }
